Name: Fast Fruit
About the game: Panda is hungry and fancies some of his favorite snacks: Fruit! - Help him collect his fruit as quickly as possible. In this arcade-like speed-game, it is your task to satisfy your Red Panda by collecting his snacks in the fastest time possible. Not happy with your time? Try again! You might even try and set a world record! Calculate the directions of the flying snacks and get used to the mechanics to shave off these crucial seconds in your battle against time.
